title: Plea for Forgiveness and Lifting of Ban
body:
Dear Riot,

3 years ago I was banned for the use of derogatory terms towards to my teammates and opponents. At the time I was still in high school and unaware of the significance behind the words in which I was using at that time. Since the ban I have matured and realized the hurtful effects that my speech had on those around me, and sincerely regret the things that I said. I now wish to return to the game and hopefully become a better member of the League community. In the 4 years that I played prior to my ban I invested over 1,000$ dollars linked to my account, therefore I humbly request that Riot forgive my previous transgressions and lift the permanent ban that is currently on my account.

Respectfully yours,

SavageSensei

replies.body: I don't want to be the bearer of bad news, but unfortunately Riot does not lift punishments unless they were made in error. You can try to [file a support ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and get in contact with Riot support directly, although you may not get your desired outcome.

You can try to [file a support ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and get in contact with Riot support directly, although you may not get your desired outcome.

Yeah they just said "nope you're toxic" in the ticket and gave me no room to explain how I thought it was an error.

Well if you ignored multiple previous punishments it makes sense that they wouldn't allow you to explain yourself or allow you to appeal it in the first place. 

 Unfortunately there has to be serious ramifications for repeat offenders, and it doesn't sound like this was made in error anyway.

I didnt ignore anything lmao I was never even given all my chances, it went from 14 day ban straight to perm I never had any chat restrictions.

> I didnt ignore anything lmao I was never even given all my chances, it went from 14 day ban straight to perm I never had any chat restrictions.

 If you immediately jumped to a 14-day suspension, that means you used zero-tolerance language such as racist or homophobic slurs, encouraged self-harm, or made death threats.
 
 All of which are unacceptable and are always met with a 14-day suspension. It was stated on your reform card that any continued negativity would result in a permanent ban and that's what happened.

> [{quoted}](name=SavageSensei,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=zfGRzw8a,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2019-06-09T03:05:05.843+0000)
>
> I didnt ignore anything lmao I was never even given all my chances, it went from 14 day ban straight to perm I never had any chat restrictions.

Those are all the chances you get when you use racial slurs, hate speech, etc.

You said in your OP that you understand that the things you said had "hurtful effects," but in your comment above you believe that your punishment was "an error" - which one is it? Anyway, the chances that your ban will be lifted are pretty much nil.

Never said I said anything racial or homophobic but yeah I realize it's pointless because won't unlift it, I know that now. This post is just for memes at this point.
Thou shalt not receive mercy! Penance be thy name!

Permanent is unfortunately well... permanent. You are welcome to start a new account though. It sucks you lose the stuff from your old account, but it may be your only recourse if you don't have any success with a support ticket.

Sorry, but Permanent means, forever. Since it's been 3 years, I'd say it's time to move on from it as they will not unban as they don't do that unless placed in error. They have done some experimental unbanning groups as well but they don't happen often (and don't sound like they've gone so well)
Sorry but maybe just let this be a valuable lesson and be mature in all things in the future lifting the ban will not teach you anything.

Like what the others said, unfortunately it's permanent. Have you been playing league on a different account since you've been banned? If not maybe the game and community has changed so much from what you remember it was that you don't find it interesting anymore. You may have matured but the community for sure hasn't (there's a reason why league's community is known to be toxic to the point of memery). Now might be a good time to put league behind you once and for all and move onto a different game.
